abstract: MetLife on Tuesday confirmed that it is in talks with the American International Group to buy a major life insurance unit, commonly known as Alico.
snippet: MetLife on Tuesday confirmed that it is in talks with the American International Group to buy a major life insurance unit, commonly known as Alico.
lead_paragraph: MetLife on Tuesday confirmed that it was in talks with the American International Group to buy a major life insurance unit, commonly known as Alico.

headline.main: MetLife Confirms Talks Over A.I.G. Unit

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
